# MobileNationalIDCardDisplayRequest.Options.ValidationMode

**Structure**

A type that represents the validation mode of the mobile document request.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ValidationMode
```

## Overview

The validation mode controls how the system UI behaves when a display request has been successfully performed.

## Type Properties

- **check**: A button that enables the user to perform a single document request.
- **checkMultiple**: A button that enables the user to perform multiple document requests in one session.
- **confirm**: Confirmation buttons that enable the user to express their validation decision.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
